greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct parts of the form 3^k - 2^k, cf. A001047.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax = 200; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1 + x^(3^k-2^k), {k, 1, Floor[Log[nmax]/Log[2]] + 1}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2017 *)
program: p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 28 2014
